attributes.action: Ban the potential teaching of Homosexuality Sex Education in Primary Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The teaching of Homosexualtiy in Sexual Education in order to stop discrimination should not be taught in primary schools.
This should be part of the anit-bullying campaign not sex ed.
Our Children have enough to contend with during the first early formative years without bringing the question of sexuality and it's morality into the mix as well.
Teach the kids to respect each other regardless of differences through anit bullying efforts and social skills.
